The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 05 September is 69,308 (7,988.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 31 August, there were 2,145 new confirmed cases (247.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 24 August, there were 2,605 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 18% (460 fewer cases).
